message.entry: Ambiguous syntax. Associated axes contains more than one image. Specify image handle as input argument to resolve ambiguity.
createMask expects a current figure containing an image.
Image object must be valid.
ROI parent must be a valid Axes object.
createMask expects either an image or two input arguments specifying the number of rows and columns of the output mask.
Invalid input. Expected input to be 'auto' or 'unlimited'.
Invalid input. Expected input to be 'all', 'translate', 'reshape', or 'none'.
DrawingArea limits must have a nonnegative width and height.
FixedAspectRatio cannot be set to true when AspectRatio is equal to NaN.
The ROI was not fully defined. ''{0}'' will be ignored and interactive placement will begin.
''{0}'' cannot be set when beginning interactive placement and will be ignored. Set this property to the desired value after the ROI has been drawn or fully defined.
Fix Aspect Ratio
Delete Rectangle
Rectangle height and width must be nonnegative.
Invalid input ''{0}'' for Rectangle ROI. Expected input to be 'all', 'translate', or 'none'.
Rectangle with rotation stem cannot be children for GeographicAxes.
Delete Polygon
Add Vertex
Delete Vertex
Delete Polyline
Delete Freehand
Add Waypoint
Remove Waypoint
Waypoints must be an N-by-1 logical array where N is the number of points defined by the ROI Position.
Delete Ellipse
Delete Circle
Delete Line
Delete Point
Invalid input ''{0}'' for Point ROI. Expected input to be 'all' or 'none'.
Delete Crosshair
Invalid input ''{0}'' for Crosshair ROI. Expected input to be 'all' or 'none'.
No image handles detected.
Image handle is invalid. Set the Image property before calling the draw method.
XData and YData properties of the image object are not aligned with the XLim and YLim properties of the parent axes.
Parent property should match the axes parent of the image object in the Image property.
DrawingCanvas is a read-only property.
AssistedFreehand cannot be a child of GeographicAxes. Use Freehand ROIs with GeographicAxes.
Lock Dimensions
Delete Cuboid
Cuboid height, width, and depth must be nonnegative.
Invalid input ''{0}'' for Cuboid ROI. Expected input to be 'all', 'translate', or 'none'.
Cuboid cannot be a child of GeographicAxes.
